[@samelogic/samelogic-js](./samelogic-js.md) &gt; [Options](./samelogic-js.options.md) &gt; [project](./samelogic-js.options.project.md)

## Options.project property

project can be used to override the default project settings that are retrieved using the [Options.appId](./samelogic-js.options.appid.md)<!-- -->. The [Options.appId](./samelogic-js.options.appid.md) will be ignored and this project will be used instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
project?: Project;
```
